overview.en: ECOSC (ECU) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. ECOSC has a current supply of 1,000,000,000 with 861,265.108355 in circulation. The last known price of ECOSC is 2.70406151 USD and is up 50.01 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 3 active market(s) with $24,121.33 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.ecosc.io/.
